verses.verse: How doth the city <WH5892> sit <WH3427> <WH8804> solitary <WH910>, that was full <WH7227> of people <WH5971> ! how is she become as a widow <WH490> ! she that was great <WH7227> among the nations <WH1471>, and princess <WH8282> among the provinces <WH4082>, how is she become tributary <WH4522> !

She weepeth <WH1058> <WH8799> sore <WH1058> <WH8800> in the night <WH3915>, and her tears <WH1832> are on her cheeks <WH3895>: among all her lovers <WH157> <WH8802> she hath none to comfort <WH5162> <WH8764> her: all her friends <WH7453> have dealt treacherously <WH898> <WH8804> with her, they are become her enemies <WH341> <WH8802>.

Y'hudah <WH3063> is gone into captivity <WH1540> <WH8804> because of affliction <WH6040>, and because of great <WH7230> servitude <WH5656>: she dwelleth <WH3427> <WH8804> among the heathen <WH1471>, she findeth <WH4672> <WH8804> no rest <WH4494>: all her persecutors <WH7291> <WH8802> overtook <WH5381> <WH8689> her between the straits <WH4712>.

The ways <WH1870> of TZiyon <WH6726> do mourn <WH57>, because none come <WH935> <WH8802> to the solemn feasts <WH4150>: all her gates <WH8179> are desolate <WH8074> <WH8802>: her Kohanim <WH3548> sigh <WH584> <WH8737>, her virgins <WH1330> are afflicted <WH3013> <WH8737>, and she is in bitterness <WH4843> <WH8804>.

Her adversaries <WH6862> are the chief <WH7218>, her enemies <WH341> <WH8802> prosper <WH7951> <WH8804>; for the YY <WH3068> hath afflicted <WH3013> <WH8689> her for the multitude <WH7230> of her transgressions <WH6588>: her children <WH5768> are gone <WH1980> <WH8804> into captivity <WH7628> before <WH6440> the enemy <WH6862>.

And from the daughter <WH1323> of TZiyon <WH6726> all her beauty <WH1926> is departed <WH3318> <WH8799>: her princes <WH8269> are become like harts <WH354> that find <WH4672> <WH8804> no pasture <WH4829>, and they are gone <WH3212> <WH8799> without strength <WH3581> before <WH6440> the pursuer <WH7291> <WH8802>.

Yerushalayim <WH3389> remembered <WH2142> <WH8804> in the days <WH3117> of her affliction <WH6040> and of her miseries <WH4788> all her pleasant things <WH4262> that she had in the days <WH3117> of old <WH6924>, when her people <WH5971> fell <WH5307> <WH8800> into the hand <WH3027> of the enemy <WH6862>, and none did help <WH5826> <WH8802> her: the adversaries <WH6862> saw <WH7200> <WH8804> her, and did mock <WH7832> <WH8804> at her sabbaths <WH4868>.

Yerushalayim <WH3389> hath grievously <WH2399> sinned <WH2398> <WH8804>; therefore she is removed <WH5206>: all that honoured <WH3513> <WH8764> her despise <WH2107> <WH8689> her, because they have seen <WH7200> <WH8804> her nakedness <WH6172>: yea, she sigheth <WH584> <WH8738>, and turneth <WH7725> <WH8799> backward <WH268>.

Her filthiness <WH2932> is in her skirts <WH7757>; she remembereth <WH2142> <WH8804> not her last end <WH319>; therefore she came down <WH3381> <WH8799> wonderfully <WH6382>: she had no comforter <WH5162> <WH8764>. O YY <WH3068>, behold <WH7200> <WH8798> my affliction <WH6040>: for the enemy <WH341> <WH8802> hath magnified <WH1431> <WH8689> himself.

The adversary <WH6862> hath spread out <WH6566> <WH8804> his hand <WH3027> upon all her pleasant things <WH4261>: for she hath seen <WH7200> <WH8804> that the heathen <WH1471> entered <WH935> <WH8804> into her sanctuary <WH4720>, whom thou didst command <WH6680> <WH8765> that they should not enter <WH935> <WH8799> into thy congregation <WH6951>.

All her people <WH5971> sigh <WH584> <WH8737>, they seek <WH1245> <WH8764> bread <WH3899>; they have given <WH5414> <WH8804> their pleasant things <WH4261> <WH8675> <WH4262> for meat <WH400> to relieve <WH7725> <WH8687> the soul <WH5315>: see <WH7200> <WH8798>, O YY <WH3068>, and consider <WH5027> <WH8685>; for I am become vile <WH2151> <WH8802>.

Is it nothing to you, all ye that pass <WH5674> <WH8802> by <WH1870>? behold <WH5027> <WH8685>, and see <WH7200> <WH8798> if there be <WH3426> any sorrow <WH4341> like unto my sorrow <WH4341>, which is done <WH5953> <WH8776> unto me, wherewith the YY <WH3068> hath afflicted <WH3013> <WH8689> me in the day <WH3117> of his fierce <WH2740> anger <WH639>.

From above <WH4791> hath he sent <WH7971> <WH8804> fire <WH784> into my bones <WH6106>, and it prevaileth <WH7287> <WH8799> against them: he hath spread <WH6566> <WH8804> a net <WH7568> for my feet <WH7272>, he hath turned <WH7725> <WH8689> me back <WH268>: he hath made <WH5414> <WH8804> me desolate <WH8074> <WH8802> and faint <WH1739> all the day <WH3117>.

The yoke <WH5923> of my transgressions <WH6588> is bound <WH8244> <WH8738> by his hand <WH3027>: they are wreathed <WH8276> <WH8691>, and come up <WH5927> <WH8804> upon my neck <WH6677>: he hath made my strength <WH3581> to fall <WH3782> <WH8689>, the YY <WH136> hath delivered <WH5414> <WH8804> me into their hands <WH3027>, from whom I am not able <WH3201> <WH8799> to rise up <WH6965> <WH8800>.

The YY <WH136> hath trodden under foot <WH5541> <WH8765> all my mighty <WH47> men in the midst <WH7130> of me: he hath called <WH7121> <WH8804> an assembly <WH4150> against me to crush <WH7665> <WH8800> my young men <WH970>: the YY <WH136> hath trodden <WH1869> <WH8804> the virgin <WH1330>, the daughter <WH1323> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, as in a winepress <WH1660>.

For these things I weep <WH1058> <WH8802>; mine eye <WH5869>, mine eye <WH5869> runneth down <WH3381> <WH8802> with water <WH4325>, because the comforter <WH5162> <WH8764> that should relieve <WH7725> <WH8688> my soul <WH5315> is far <WH7368> <WH8804> from me: my children <WH1121> are desolate <WH8074> <WH8802>, because the enemy <WH341> <WH8802> prevailed <WH1396> <WH8804>.

TZiyon <WH6726> spreadeth forth <WH6566> <WH8765> her hands <WH3027>, and there is none to comfort <WH5162> <WH8764> her: the YY <WH3068> hath commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> concerning Ya`akov <WH3290>, that his adversaries <WH6862> should be round about <WH5439> him: Yerushalayim <WH3389> is as a menstruous woman <WH5079> among them.

The YY <WH3068> is righteous <WH6662>; for I have rebelled <WH4784> <WH8804> against his Mitzvah <WH6310>: hear <WH8085> <WH8798>, I pray you, all people <WH5971>, and behold <WH7200> <WH8798> my sorrow <WH4341>: my virgins <WH1330> and my young men <WH970> are gone <WH1980> <WH8804> into captivity <WH7628>.

I called <WH7121> <WH8804> for my lovers <WH157> <WH8764>, but they deceived <WH7411> <WH8765> me: my Kohanim <WH3548> and mine elders <WH2205> gave up the ghost <WH1478> <WH8804> in the city <WH5892>, while they sought <WH1245> <WH8765> their meat <WH400> to relieve <WH7725> <WH8686> their souls <WH5315>.

Behold <WH7200> <WH8798>, O YY <WH3068>; for I am in distress <WH6887> <WH8804>: my bowels <WH4578> are troubled <WH2560> <WH8777>; mine heart <WH3820> is turned <WH2015> <WH8738> within <WH7130> me; for I have grievously <WH4784> <WH8800> rebelled <WH4784> <WH8804>: abroad <WH2351> the sword <WH2719> bereaveth <WH7921> <WH8765>, at home <WH1004> there is as death <WH4194>.

They have heard <WH8085> <WH8804> that I sigh <WH584> <WH8737>: there is none to comfort <WH5162> <WH8764> me: all mine enemies <WH341> <WH8802> have heard <WH8085> <WH8804> of my trouble <WH7451>; they are glad <WH7797> <WH8804> that thou hast done <WH6213> <WH8804> it: thou wilt bring <WH935> <WH8689> the day <WH3117> that thou hast called <WH7121> <WH8804>, and they shall be like <WH3644> unto me.

Let all their wickedness <WH7451> come <WH935> <WH8799> before <WH6440> thee; and do <WH5953> <WH8778> unto them, as thou hast done <WH5953> <WH8782> unto me for all my transgressions <WH6588>: for my sighs <WH585> are many <WH7227>, and my heart <WH3820> is faint <WH1742>.
